name: GoToMeetingMeetingTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Ever feel stuck in mundane and unproductive meetings, wasting time and not getting anything done? Our daily productivity tip will enable you to have more effective meetings. Whether you are looking to grow excitement around a new project, lead a convincing presentation, close the sale, or get buy-in from senior executives, this skill is for you.

The GoToMeeting: Meeting Tip of the Day includes the following categories:

• Effective meeting starts & ice breakers
• How to ask the right questions
• Tips for better Video Conferencing
• Meeting & Project Management Productivity Tools
• Do's and Don'ts of Meetings
• Reading your audience and body language
• Stories from successful companies and CEOs
• Effective presentation ideas

Let GoToMeeting: Meeting Tip of the Day inspire you to have another great day at work. Add our Alexa skill now and take on your meetings with confidence.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
